---
category: news
title: "Be wary of machine learning, study warns health insurers"
excerpt: "Although machine learning already is widely used in the healthcare system, researchers in a new report are calling for vigilance in its use by health insurers. Machine learning is used by health insurers to predict everything from early disease onset and medication noncompliance to the likelihood of future hospitalizations."
